short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove retweets and shares from your social media feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of a cluttered feed? Want to see more than just cat videos? This plugin allows you to automatically remove retweets and shares from Facebook and Twitter.
